inout.paths

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • inout.paths.Path

  • public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
    Path is an object create by the PathParser which stores all necessary information about an Indexing / Lexicon, which is the details about the data (frequency or probability), the directory, the extension (is it an archive?), the coding (default, hexadecimal or binary) and the task (is it to be read or to be written?).
    Author:
    Dennis Ulmer
